Hiya! Well am gona start today by tlkin bout yesterday. Was mazin :D me n helen went shoppin which was fun but a was knackered so wasnt really in d mood but yano! Wen we got bak from town a sat in mine all alone cos mum n dad n that went 2 c Shrek 2 n av seen it n was goin 2 c tom n jay n babes anyway. Helen tuk ages gettin ready lol but i didnt mind cos i got 2 tlk 2 jay on msn :D wen we wer finally ready wendy giv us a lift 2 bhed n we got d train blah blah. Tom cum n met us at d station afta we'd bin d shop n bort pressies (lol happy hippos) but we had 2 go bk 2 get im sum cred lol then we wlked down n toms n met jay n babes on the way :D its funny how evri1 like trys 2 get me n jay 2 stand next 2 each utha n that cute n funny lol. A sat next 2 jay in toms :) a like im hes cute, e didnt spk much 2 me but a put ma hed on im n went 2 sleep lol a fink e was sleepy 2...no suprises there! We just sat off in toms 2 ages n got 2 see his sistas m8s brothers baby which was well cute! n the illegal imigrants wer ther lol. Toms mums so cute! she came in 2 the lil study room thing n was sayin how cute babes was! n me n helen wer like awww! bless er lol n wen d imigrants left she popped her head in the door n went 'they wer the illegal imigrants!' lol was well funny! well me n helen had 2 go soon afta that so well all left toms, babes didnt walk wit us cos he lives in the opposite direction 2 d station but tom n jay walked wit us. Jay left wen we walked past is road n tom n helen like fuked off n left us on r own which is cute ov dem, lol tom was like wer lettin u say bye n walked off, jay just chatted 4 a bit n was like yer am goin this way now n asked me if i wanted a gudbye kiss, obv i was like yer! lol in a non weird way yer u get me, n then e got in2 me :) wasnt amazin n was very short but yano :D a went 2 catch up with helen n tom n we wlked d station n got d trainy, toms well cute yano bless im bonin off helen! hes nicer 2 me now tho, like notices me more :) its cute. we was on d train n as usual met many drunks d 1st 1 was well funny just chattin showin us is id n that was funny then we changed trains n met sum ppl hu wernt drunk...just weird lol, 1 was asleep n d utha 1 was scottish lol helen poked d asleep 1 2 wake im up n we was chattin 2 im. the scottish 1 kept like touchin ma hand n a was like scared, as we was gettin off d train in bhed north e was went 2 helen sit on me knee n she did n was like y n e goes a just wana giv ya a little snog! was well funny! e was 27! haha! we was chattin 2 d station man in d station w8in 4 d west kirby train he was kewl askin us mad questions n tellin us which line u die if u touch was sick lol. neway we got home blah blah. was tlkin 2 jay on msn :D hes sooooo cute e was apologisin 4 the bad kiss n i was like nah wasnt bad, it was gud....but at least e didnt wash ma face! lmao. aw. wen a went 2 bed a was finkin bout im :D a do like im :D a didnt fancy im at all at 1st but a duno now a do, hes such a nice person! hes welll cute - well rugged as he'd say lol. aw a duno wot more 2 say utha than a really like im n yano :D haha! wish e ad cred so a cud txt im! lol. god h8 it wen a get like dis bout lads, a hope e isnt a cock!

Welcome to my life, in this blog i am going to rite everyday, maybe more than once, about whats going on wit me. Its like a diary, n am going to tell u everything n not show anyone. This blog is starting from now, my new life, not anything that's happened in the past, any past happenings unless still going on wont be mentioned meaning am only going to rite about kewl things! Yay! Am leaving behind all the crap that I used 2 think n feel n am starting a new kind of diary. Its fun being able 2 ramble without anyone knowing because a can b as crappy and gay as a want lol. Well this is my intro n now am going to start writing, a want to talk bout yesterday day 1st...A no a said no past, but yesterday is part of now. :D Luv Han xxx
